description: The AWS::Timestream::Table resource creates a Timestream Table.

Tag.description: You can use the Resource Tags property to apply tags to resources, which can help you identify and categorize those resources.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
You can use the Resource Tags property to apply tags to resources, which can help you identify and categorize those resources.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

PartitionKeyList.description: A list of partition keys defining the attributes used to partition the table data. The order of the list determines the partition hierarchy. The name and type of each partition key as well as the partition key order cannot be changed after the table is created. However, the enforcement level of each partition key can be changed.
PartitionKeyList.markdownDescription:
A list of partition keys defining the attributes used to partition the table data. The order of the list determines the partition hierarchy. The name and type of each partition key as well as the partition key order cannot be changed after the table is created. However, the enforcement level of each partition key can be changed.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

PartitionKey.description: An attribute used in partitioning data in a table. There are two types of partition keys: dimension keys and measure keys. A dimension key partitions data on a dimension name, while a measure key partitions data on the measure name.
PartitionKey.markdownDescription:
An attribute used in partitioning data in a table. There are two types of partition keys: dimension keys and measure keys. A dimension key partitions data on a dimension name, while a measure key partitions data on the measure name.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

PartitionKeyType.description: The type of the partition key. Options are DIMENSION (dimension key) and MEASURE (measure key).
PartitionKeyType.markdownDescription:
The type of the partition key. Options are DIMENSION (dimension key) and MEASURE (measure key).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: DIMENSION | MEASURE  
Update requires: No interruption

SchemaName.description: The name of the attribute used for a dimension key.
SchemaName.markdownDescription:
The name of the attribute used for a dimension key.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

PartitionKeyEnforcementLevel.description: The level of enforcement for the specification of a dimension key in ingested records. Options are REQUIRED (dimension key must be specified) and OPTIONAL (dimension key does not have to be specified).
PartitionKeyEnforcementLevel.markdownDescription:
The level of enforcement for the specification of a dimension key in ingested records. Options are REQUIRED (dimension key must be specified) and OPTIONAL (dimension key does not have to be specified).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL  
Update requires: No interruption

DatabaseName.description: The name for the database which the table to be created belongs to.
DatabaseName.markdownDescription:
The name for the database which the table to be created belongs to.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]{3,256}$  
Update requires: Replacement

TableName.description: The name for the table. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the table name.
TableName.markdownDescription:
The name for the table. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the table name.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]{3,256}$  
Update requires: Replacement

RetentionProperties.description: The retention duration of the memory store and the magnetic store.

MemoryStoreRetentionPeriodInHours.description: The duration for which data must be stored in the memory store.
MemoryStoreRetentionPeriodInHours.markdownDescription:
The duration for which data must be stored in the memory store.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

MagneticStoreRetentionPeriodInDays.description: The duration for which data must be stored in the magnetic store.
MagneticStoreRetentionPeriodInDays.markdownDescription:
The duration for which data must be stored in the magnetic store.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

RetentionProperties.markdownDescription:
The retention duration of the memory store and the magnetic store.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Schema.description: A Schema specifies the expected data model of the table.
Schema.markdownDescription:
A Schema specifies the expected data model of the table.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MagneticStoreWriteProperties.description: The properties that determine whether magnetic store writes are enabled.

EnableMagneticStoreWrites.description: Boolean flag indicating whether magnetic store writes are enabled.
EnableMagneticStoreWrites.markdownDescription:
Boolean flag indicating whether magnetic store writes are enabled.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

MagneticStoreRejectedDataLocation.description: Location to store information about records that were asynchronously rejected during magnetic store writes.

S3Configuration.description: S3 configuration for location to store rejections from magnetic store writes

BucketName.description: The bucket name used to store the data.
BucketName.markdownDescription:
The bucket name used to store the data.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ObjectKeyPrefix.description: String used to prefix all data in the bucket.
ObjectKeyPrefix.markdownDescription:
String used to prefix all data in the bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionOption.markdownDescription:
Either SSE_KMS or SSE_S3.

Update requires: No interruption
